QuestData.Title: Mistfall Village
QuestData.Description: My scouts have spotted no mogu near Mistfall Village today, but I've been hearing of some troubles with local wildlife and spirits in the graveyard. I dispatched Che to assess the situation, but he'll most likely need your help.$B$BFind your way southwest to the village and meet Che there. Do what you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Che Wildwalker at Mistfall Village.
